amendment.description: Amendment provides $7 million for a scholarship program in the District of Columbia for children in low income families.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in H. Rept. 105-679 to provide both tuition scholarships and enhanced achievement scholarships for grades K through 12 for District of Columbia residents whose family incomes meet the eligibility qualifications.

action.text: On agreeing to the Armey amendment (A012) Agreed to by recorded vote: 214 - 208 (Roll No. 411).
